content: hey im going to post on twitter what should i say

parts.text: hey im going to post on twitter what should i say

content: "Just realized that life is like a meme stuck in the Buddhist Realms. From Hell to Demigod, we cycle through states faster than a caffeine-fueled squirrel. #ExistentialCrisis"
